C

c - Variable in class general.Player
The color of this player's pieces, used to validate moves.
CheckerBoard - Class in checkers
Represents a checkerboard, a black and red 8 by 8 Board.
CheckerBoard() - Constructor for class checkers.CheckerBoard
Creates a new CheckerBoard with CheckerPieces in their proper starting positions.
CheckerPiece - Class in checkers
Represents a checker, with a Side of the board and a piece Color.
CheckerPiece(Side, Color) - Constructor for class checkers.CheckerPiece
Creates a new Checker and sets the icon and ImageIcon appropriately.
checkers - package checkers
 
clip - Variable in class general.SoundPlayer
The Clip currently being played.
close() - Method in class general.SoundPlayer
Closes the Clip, freeing up memory.
color - Variable in class general.Piece
The color of this piece, used to identify which player it is associated with.
containsArray(List<int[]>, int[]) - Static method in class general.Utils
Checks if a list contains an array using Arrays.equals(int[], int[]).
countPieces() - Method in class general.Board
Counts the number of pieces on the board.
countPieces(Color) - Method in class general.Board
Counts the number of pieces with the specified Color.
